case.name: btts-t-40-opp-put-to-phone-other-cancels
case.description:
BTTS T 40 OPP - Put to Phone - Other Cancels
Test OPP "put" from the other device to the phone.
- The other device cancels the transfer before it ends
case.step: BTTS: Ensure a test object (a file) is available on this host. It should be big enought to guarantee a useful transfer time.

Set object to test with with:
bttsr opp-client set-object <file_name> < <file_path>
PHONE: Verify an incoming transfer is reported
PHONE: Verify a file transfer and its progress is being reported
PHONE: Verify the operation has been interrupted and an appropriate message has been displayed.
